name: ddnet
description: Pulls data from ddnet.tw, otherwise known as "DDRace Network".

scripts._1: echo tsc is hard so i basically copied my config file into the command lol
scripts.build-test: tsc ./testing/moduleTest.ts --target ESNext --module CommonJS --skipLibCheck true --moduleResolution Node --resolveJsonModule true --allowSyntheticDefaultImports true --esModuleInterop true --declaration true --sourceMap true
scripts.test: npm run build-test && tput reset && node ./testing/moduleTest.js

author: thatboisans
